name: Destiny: The Taken King - Legendary Edition
name_original: Destiny: The Taken King - Legendary Edition
description:
Destiny: The Taken King - Legendary Edition is a shooter game developed by Bungie. It came out on 15-09-2015. Activision Blizzard published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
Destiny: The Taken King - Legendary Edition is available on PlayStation 3.
